Package gui

Interface PetrinetMenuInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
MainController
public interface PetrinetMenuInterface
An interface defining methods for entries in PetrinetMenu.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onAnalyseMany()
    Open a dialog to choose (multiple) pnml file(s) to analyse.
    void
    onChangeDesign()
    Change between the LookAndFeel "Nimbus" (default) and "Metal" (java default).
    void
    onClose()
    Close the currently opened file.
    void
    onCloseEditor()
    Close the PetrinetGraphEditor.
    void
    onExit()
    Exit the program.
    void
    onInfo()
    Open an info box showing java version and user directory used.
    void
    onNew()
    Opens a new empty petrinet in the PetrinetGraphEditor.
    void
    onOpen()
    Open a dialog to choose a pnml file from which to load a petrinet.
    void
    onOpenEditor()
    Open the PetrinetGraphEditor.
    void
    onOpenInNewTab()
    Open a dialog to choose a pnml file from which to load a petrinet and open it in a new tab.
    void
    onReload()
    Reload the contents of the currently opened file.
    void
    onSave()
    Save changes to the file the petrinet has been opened from.
    void
    onSaveAs()
    Open a dialog to choose a directory and file name to save the current petrinet to.

  • Method Details

    • onNew

      void onNew()
      Opens a new empty petrinet in the PetrinetGraphEditor.

    • onOpen

      void onOpen()
      Open a dialog to choose a pnml file from which to load a petrinet.

    • onOpenInNewTab

      void onOpenInNewTab()
      Open a dialog to choose a pnml file from which to load a petrinet and open it in a new tab.

    • onSave

      void onSave()
      Save changes to the file the petrinet has been opened from.

    • onSaveAs

      void onSaveAs()
      Open a dialog to choose a directory and file name to save the current petrinet to.

    • onReload

      void onReload()
      Reload the contents of the currently opened file.

    • onAnalyseMany

      void onAnalyseMany()
      Open a dialog to choose (multiple) pnml file(s) to analyse. The results are printed in the text area of MainFrame.

    • onClose

      void onClose()
      Close the currently opened file.

    • onExit

      void onExit()
      Exit the program.

    • onOpenEditor

      void onOpenEditor()
      Open the PetrinetGraphEditor.

    • onCloseEditor

      void onCloseEditor()
      Close the PetrinetGraphEditor.

    • onChangeDesign

      void onChangeDesign()
      Change between the LookAndFeel "Nimbus" (default) and "Metal" (java default).

    • onInfo

      void onInfo()
      Open an info box showing java version and user directory used.
